homepage.text: Help Lucas and Marie find the code word the doctor needs to help the patient. With this code word you receive a lovely gift ! Choose the image below that matches the activity and answer the questions to find the code word . Good luck {{playerName}}!
homepage.qstn: WHAT IS THE CODE WORD WE ARE LOOKING FOR?

beepage.prompt: Welcome to the sperm game! Do you know what you can fish up here?

correctpage.message: You can continue when clicking on the arrow.

butterflypage.title: Welcome to the laparoscopy demo!
butterflypage.text: Here you can perform an operation yourself like a real doctor! Do you want to give it a try?
butterflypage.textp2: When performing the operation, you will see a letter inside the box. Which letter is it?

correctpage.message: butterYou can continue when clicking on the arrow.

ladybugpage.title: Welcome to the ultrasound!
ladybugpage.text: On the door you can find a number. This is the number of ultrasounds we performed in 2022.
ladybugpage.textp2: Which number will you get when you make the sum of the first and the last number?
ladybugpage.prompt: On the door you can find a number. This is the number of ultrasounds we performed in 2022.

correctpage.message: ladyYou can continue when clicking on the arrow.

slugpage.title: Welcome to the Lab demo!
slugpage.text: Here you can see a lab person bringing the sperm cell into the egg cell with a very small needle.
slugpage.textp2: How do they call this act?

correctpage.message: slugYou can continue when clicking on the arrow.

chickpage.title: Welcome to the auditorium where the doctor give a lecture!
chickpage.text: Listen very well to what the doctor says.
chickpage.textp2: In what year was the center founded?

correctpage.message: chickYou can continue when clicking on the arrow.
planeYou can continue when clicking on the arrow.

guesscodepage.almostmsg: You are almost there, you can do it!
guesscodepage.text: ENTER HERE THE CODE WORD WE ARE LOOKING FOR TO HELP THE PATIENT

correctpage.message: You can continue when clicking on the arrow.

finalpage.congrats: You have found the code word the doctor needs for the patient! In return you will receive a gift on the main floor. It was great to have met you!
